title: Unspecified Error occured.
body:
Hello...can somebody help me please? I try to download new patch..but it always stuck at 32% or 33% and ERROR. ''Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information.'' Sometimes I get to 99% but nothing,it just stuck.
I really try everything...reinstall game,delete some files,hextech repair tool,Patching issues,change regional...really everything but still same problem..I contact support,they ask me for DxDiag and Logs,I send it to them,but they still don´t respond me..so I try this forum I really dont know what to do. Please help me guys!!!

replies.body:
Since you've already submitted a support ticket and are working with a tech specialist, I recommend waiting for the specialist to get back to you before troubleshooting this further. Your assigned-specialist has far more context on this issue since they have access to your system logs.

Let me know if you have any questions!
No specialist is working with me rn. the previous post is unrelated to this issue.

[Grant League permission to run on your computer!](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)

http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Annie_3.jpg
